testcase.classname: To validate the login functionality of facebook application
testcase.name: To validate the login functionality with invalid username and password
testcase.system-out: Given The user should be in facebook page...................................passed When The user has to fill invalid "manoj"and "34567"........................passed And The user has to click the "login" button................................passed Then The user should navigate to the invalid login page.....................passed

testcase.classname: To validate the registration functionality of facebook application
testcase.name: To validate the registration functionality
testcase.system-out: Given The user should be in facebook page...................................passed When The user has to click create new account link..........................passed And The user has to fill the firstname, lastname and other details..........passed And The user has to click the "signup" button...............................passed Then The user should get message successfull registered.....................passed
